verses.verse: Elihu<WH453> also proceeded<WH3254>, and said<WH559>,
Suffer<WH3803> me a little<WH2191>, and I will shew<WH2331> thee that I have yet to speak<WH4405> on God's<WH433> behalf.
I will fetch<WH5375> my knowledge<WH1843> from afar<WH7350>, and will ascribe<WH5414> righteousness<WH6664> to my Maker<WH6466>.
For truly<WH551> my words<WH4405> shall not be false<WH8267>: he that is perfect<WH8549> in knowledge<WH1844> is with thee.
Behold, God<WH410> is mighty<WH3524>, and despiseth<WH3988> not any: he is mighty<WH3524> in strength<WH3581> and wisdom<WH3820>.
He preserveth not the life<WH2421> of the wicked<WH7563>: but giveth<WH5414> right<WH4941> to the poor<WH6041>.

He withdraweth<WH1639> not his eyes<WH5869> from the righteous<WH6662>: but with kings<WH4428> are they on the throne<WH3678>; yea, he doth establish<WH3427> them for ever<WH5331>, and they are exalted<WH1361>.
And if they be bound<WH631> in fetters<WH2131>, and be holden<WH3920> in cords<WH2256> of affliction<WH6040>;
Then he sheweth<WH5046> them their work<WH6467>, and their transgressions<WH6588> that they have exceeded<WH1396>.
He openeth<WH1540> also their ear<WH241> to discipline<WH4148>, and commandeth<WH559> that they return<WH7725> from iniquity<WH205>.
If they obey<WH8085> and serve<WH5647> him, they shall spend<WH3615> their days<WH3117> in prosperity<WH2896>, and their years<WH8141> in pleasures<WH5273>.
But if they obey<WH8085> not, they shall perish<WH5674> by the sword<WH7973>, and they shall die<WH1478> without knowledge<WH1847>.
But the hypocrites<WH2611> in heart<WH3820> heap up<WH7760> wrath<WH639>: they cry<WH7768> not when he bindeth<WH631> them.
They<WH5315> die<WH4191> in youth<WH5290>, and their life<WH2416> is among the unclean<WH6945>.
He delivereth<WH2502> the poor<WH6041> in his affliction<WH6040>, and openeth<WH1540> their ears<WH241> in oppression<WH3906>.

Even so would he have removed<WH5496> thee out of the strait<WH6310><WH6862> into a broad place<WH7338>, where<WH8478> there is no straitness<WH4164>; and that which should be set<WH5183> on thy table<WH7979> should be full<WH4390> of fatness<WH1880>.
But thou hast fulfilled<WH4390> the judgment<WH1779> of the wicked<WH7563>: judgment<WH1779> and justice<WH4941> take hold<WH8551> on thee.
Because there is wrath<WH2534>, beware lest he take thee away<WH5496> with his stroke<WH5607>: then a great<WH7230> ransom<WH3724> cannot deliver<WH5186> thee.
Will he esteem<WH6186> thy riches<WH7769>? no, not gold<WH1222>, nor all the forces<WH3981> of strength<WH3581>.
Desire<WH7602> not the night<WH3915>, when people<WH5971> are cut off<WH5927> in their place.
Take heed<WH8104>, regard<WH6437> not iniquity<WH205>: for this hast thou chosen<WH977> rather than affliction<WH6040>.
Behold, God<WH410> exalteth<WH7682> by his power<WH3581>: who teacheth<WH3384> like him?
Who hath enjoined<WH6485> him his way<WH1870>? or who can say<WH559>, Thou hast wrought<WH6466> iniquity<WH5766>?
Remember<WH2142> that thou magnify<WH7679> his work<WH6467>, which men<WH582> behold<WH7891>.
Every man<WH120> may see<WH2372> it; man<WH582> may behold<WH5027> it afar off<WH7350>.
Behold, God<WH410> is great<WH7689>, and we know<WH3045> him not, neither can the number<WH4557> of his years<WH8141> be searched out<WH2714>.
For he maketh small<WH1639> the drops<WH5198> of water<WH4325>: they pour down<WH2212> rain<WH4306> according to the vapour<WH108> thereof:
Which the clouds<WH7834> do drop<WH5140> and distil<WH7491> upon man<WH120> abundantly<WH7227>.
Also can any understand<WH995> the spreadings<WH4666> of the clouds<WH5645>, or the noise<WH8663> of his tabernacle<WH5521>?
Behold, he spreadeth<WH6566> his light<WH216> upon it, and covereth<WH3680> the bottom<WH8328> of the sea<WH3220>.
For by them judgeth<WH1777> he the people<WH5971>; he giveth<WH5414> meat<WH400> in abundance<WH4342>.
With clouds<WH3709> he covereth<WH3680> the light<WH216>; and commandeth<WH6680> it not to shine by the cloud that cometh betwixt<WH6293>.
The noise<WH7452> thereof sheweth<WH5046> concerning it, the cattle<WH4735> also concerning the vapour<WH5927>.
